name: 'Tis the Season...
description:
Made in 48 hours as part of the AIE & GamePlus December 2021 GameJam.

The Game

“Krampus is a top-down stealth game where you play as a child who is being hunted around their house by Krampus for not having enough Christmas jolly. They must place decorations around the house and make it to bed, all while evading Krampus and his goons.”

The Goal

Find all the decorations around the map, pick them up and place them in their correct places before Krampus and his goons get you! When his goons find you, they will alert Krampus to your last known location, so if you run into one of them get out of there fast!

WASD - Move E - Interact Esc - Pause

The Team

Design - Luke Schlesier
Art - Hannah Lamb, Hannah Levi, Monika Haselhuhn, Ricky-Lee Hudson-Stephens & Shay-Lee Atkins
Programming - Callum McDermott, Charlie O'Regan, James Bobier & Jonathan Nemec
Music - James Gorczyca
